sentences.sentence: All those who overstep the limit are pitilessly punished by her.
sentences.translation: 所有那些逾越界限的人们都将受到她无情的鞭笞与惩罚。

sentences.sentence: Those denying the truth of this statement are badly prejudiced and must be pitilessly "liquidated."
sentences.translation: 而否认这一主张的人就是心存恶毒偏见之人，必须被无情地“消灭”掉。
